articles.content: Actor John Abraham is promoting his film Ek Villain Returns, which also stars actors Tara Sutaria, Arjun Kapoor, and Disha Patani. The action-thriller is produced by Ekta Kapoors Balaji Motion Pictur… [+1629 chars]

articles.description: Amber Heard’s face is almost perfect – according to scientific standards, says a new report. The actor has been in news for her and ex-husband Johnny Depp’s defamation trial, which ended in June.

articles.description: Mira Rajput is in Switzerland. She shared photos from her family holiday on Instagram, where she also introduced her and Shahid Kapoor’s son Zain Kapoor as a ‘serial photobomber’.
